meanings.sent1: She enjoys beholding the stars at night.
meanings.sent2: I like beholding the beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: Beholding the playful puppy made her smile.
meanings.sent4: His eyes beholding the vast ocean, he felt a sense of peace.
meanings.sent5: Beholding the rainbow after the rain was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: To look at or gaze upon
meanings.sent1: The child was beholding the colorful balloons with wonder.
meanings.sent2: Tourists were beholding the majestic waterfall in awe.
meanings.sent3: Beholding the messy room, she sighed and started cleaning.
meanings.sent4: His beholding gaze seemed to penetrate through her soul.
meanings.sent5: Beholding the sunset over the horizon was a magical moment.
